description:
Boruto’s desperate attempts to reason with Ikada fail and he’s unable to change his mind. He prepares himself to give his life to stop the Land of Water and the pirates from fighting. He tells Sarada and Mitsuki that they should not seek revenge if he ends up dying. However, neither of them is able to stand idly by. 
Will Boruto and his friends manage to stop this cycle of revenge and restore peace to the seas?!
Source: Crunchyroll
